name: T4XE
body:
# T4XE

Our customers loved TAXE 3. But with T4XE, we have reinvented the train-orientated turn-based strategy game.

# Watch yourself

Sometimes, the things we achieve with Trains Across Europe are truly sensational. Now, you can relive that moment with Replay.

# Ultimate Blockage

Adding and removing tracks is one of the most magical new features we've included in T4XE.

# Phwoar

In our continuous effort to reach fewer than 800 lines of magical code, T4XE is now thinner and lighter than ever before.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
